restaurants.name: Tandoori Nights
restaurants.location: B-8, Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi, Delhi 110016

reviews.author: Michael Patel
reviews.text: This place has the best tandoori chicken I've ever had. The naan was also fantastic.

reviews.author: Priya Singh
reviews.text: The biryani was delicious and the service was excellent. I highly recommend this restaurant.

reviews.author: Amit Shah
reviews.text: The butter chicken was amazing and the garlic naan was so fresh. Will definitely come back here.

reviews.author: Deepika Singh
reviews.text: I loved the variety of vegetarian options available. The palak paneer was my favorite.

restaurants.name: The Spice Room
restaurants.location: D-12, Greater Kailash 2, New Delhi, Delhi 110048

reviews.author: Rajesh Mehta
reviews.text: This is my new favorite Indian restaurant. The food was top-notch and the atmosphere was perfect.

reviews.author: Sonia Gupta
reviews.text: I loved the lamb rogan josh and the aloo gobi. The portions were generous and the staff was very friendly.

restaurants.name: Dakshin South Indian Cuisine
restaurants.location: 12, Kasturba Nagar, Adyar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600020

reviews.author: Suresh Kumar
reviews.text: The idlis were so fluffy and the sambar was delicious. Will definitely come back here.

reviews.author: Priya Raj
reviews.text: The masala dosa was amazing and the chutneys were the perfect accompaniment.

restaurants.name: Annalakshmi Restaurant
restaurants.location: No.19, 4th Main Road, Gandhi Nagar, Adyar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600020

reviews.author: Ramesh Patel
reviews.text: The food was fantastic and the atmosphere was very peaceful. Highly recommend this restaurant.

reviews.author: Meena Kumar
reviews.text: The naan was so soft and the butter chicken was so flavorful. Will definitely come back here.

restaurants.name: Saravana Bhavan
restaurants.location: 35, Usman Road, T. Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600017

reviews.author: Vijay Singh
reviews.text: The food was delicious and the portions were generous. The staff was also very friendly.

reviews.author: Sarika Sharma
reviews.text: I loved the masala uttapam and the sambar was so flavorful. Will definitely come back here.
